allow:
Bash(.specify/scripts/bash/create-new-feature.sh --json "/sp.specify

Build: Phase II Frontend for Todo Web Application

Target users:
- Authenticated end users managing personal tasks

Frontend responsibilities:
- User signup and signin using Better Auth
- JWT token management on client
- Task CRUD UI \(create, list, update, delete, toggle complete\)
- Responsive UI for desktop and mobile
- Secure API communication with FastAPI backend

Out of scope:
- Backend logic
- Database schema changes
- AI/chatbot features
- Admin dashboards

Constraints:
- Use specs from /specs/*
- No direct database access
- No business logic duplication from backend" --number 1 --short-name "todo-frontend-auth")

Bash(python -m pip install --break-system-packages fastapi==0.100.0 sqlmodel==0.0.8 pydantic==2.0.0 pydantic-settings==2.0.0 uvicorn==0.22.0 "psycopg[binary]==3.1.18" python-dotenv==1.0.0 python-jose[cryptography]==3.3.0 passlib[bcrypt]==1.7.4 python-multipart==0.0.6 alembic==1.11.0 asyncpg==0.27.0 pytest==7.4.0 pytest-asyncio==0.21.0 httpx==0.24.0)
Bash(python -m pip install --break-system-packages psycopg[binary]==3.1.18 fastapi==0.100.0 sqlmodel==0.0.8)

Bash(python -m pip install --break-system-packages pydantic==2.0.0 pydantic-settings==2.0.0 uvicorn==0.22.0 python-dotenv==1.0.0 python-jose[cryptography]==3.3.0 passlib[bcrypt]==1.7.4 python-multipart==0.0.6 alembic==1.11.0 asyncpg==0.27.0 pytest==7.4.0 pytest-asyncio==0.21.0 httpx==0.24.0)
Bash(python -c "from main import app; print\(''Backend import successful''\)")
Bash(PYTHONPATH=. python -c "from main import app; print\(''Backend import successful''\)")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''.''\)
try:
    from main import app
    print\(''✓ Main app imported successfully''\)
    print\(''✓ psycopg-binary is available:'', ''psycopg'' in globals\(\) or ''psycopg'' in str\(locals\(\)\)\)
    import psycopg
    print\(''✓ psycopg module loaded successfully''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(''✗ Error:'', str\(e\)\)
    import traceback
    traceback.print_exc\(\)
")
Bash(python -c "from main import app; print\(''✓ Backend import successful''\)")
Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'while ! nc -z localhost 3000; do sleep 0.5; done; echo ""Frontend is running on port 3000""')
Bash(python3 -c "from main import app; print\(''Backend import successful''\)")
